story_28_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
We’re only a few moments away from our third
battle with Lear...
story_28_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Is this really the third time?
story_28_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Our first battle with him was a one-on-one, huh.
Didn’t he totally crush us that day?
story_28_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Yeah, but we beat him the next time we battled!
We ran circles around him with our awesome
teamwork, remember?
story_28_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Both of our teams have won once and lost once.
Today we get to settle that score.
story_28_02000/2401_0401_0700_10: I’m sure Lear’s thinking the same thing right now.
story_28_02000/2401_0401_0800_10:
Let’s make this a super awesome battle! I promise
to give it my all!
story_28_02000/2401_0302_0900_10: Let’s have some fun with it!
story_28_02000/2401_0402_1000_10: You two never change a bit, do you.
story_28_02000/2401_0402_1100_10:
*giggle* Come on! Let’s all have a superduper
fun battle with Lear!
story_28_02000/2401_1001_1300_10: Lear and his team are running awfully late.
story_28_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Oh, you’re right... Maybe their battle prep is
taking a little longer than they expected.
story_28_02000/2401_1001_1600_10: Where in the world are they?
story_28_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
We’re supposed to be starting our match
right now...
story_28_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Do you think something bad might have happened
to Lear and the others?
story_28_02000/2401_1001_1900_10: Wait... In that battle with Team Break...
story_28_02000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Team Break?! Cheren, do you know something
you’re not telling us?
story_28_02000/2401_1001_2100_10: If you have any clues, we’re all ears!
story_28_02000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Well, I wasn’t going to mention anything since I
thought it might distract us from the match, but
I guess now is as good a time as any.
story_28_02000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Ahahahahaha! Today the curtains close on the
Pokémon Masters League!
story_28_02000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Well hello, ladies and gentlemen of Pasio!
Team Break here! Did you miss us?
story_28_02000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Our lovely team members are about to storm this
stadium and wreak havoc on the place! Do enjoy
the show!
story_28_02000/2401_1001_3000_10:
I’m worried about him, too, but right now our first
priority is stopping Team Break!
story_28_02000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Come on, everyone! It’s up to us to protect
the PML!
